description:
Embrace the journey, man. With a comfortable fit and feel, plus a lighthearted graphic that adds a bit of playfulness wherever you go, our long-sleeve Journeyman makes it easy to do just that.

Designed with a sustainable fabric blend by and responsibly assembled around the world, this style feels good to wear in more ways than one. It’s soft, breathable, and an easy outfitting option for any day of the week
name: Prana Journeyman LS T-Shirt - Mens
